attributes.additional_details:
My Partner Breached a restraining order that i imposed in 2014, myself and my partner has tried to get this removal off 5 times and it keeps being adjourned, he is looking at a custodial sentence now. I have been diagnosed with Cancer and unsure of how bad it is as of yet. I cant tell my partner or see or speak to him because of this.

Iv wrote to the judge, the IDVA and they are refusing to listen to me.
The next hearing is 5th feb 2015 and is likely to get adjourned again please help by signing this so i can see and speak to him before its too late.

I am scared of this Cancer and how it will impact my life, and worried i wont be able to say goodbye to him

Please sign this and help get it removed and my voice heard
